meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>East</kanji> <kanji>North</kanji> area of Japan is called <vocabulary>Tohoku</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>Tohoku region</vocabulary>. It was the region hit by the 2011 Tohoku Earthquake. This can also mean <vocabulary>northeast region</vocabulary> when talking about China or Japan, but for other countries (and for the direction) we'd use 北東.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
